items.content_html: DBTop Monitoring is lightweight application to perform realtime monitoring for AWS Database Resources. Based on same simplicity concept of Unix top utility, provide quick and fast view of database performance, just all in one screen.

items.content_html: GeoWKTer is a lightweight JS library for converting Well-Known Text (WKT) to GeoJSON. It handles Point, MultiPoint, LineString, MultiLineString, Polygon, MultiPolygon, and GeometryCollection. Ideal for small frontend projects, it efficiently parses and converts spatial data with minimal dependencies.
items.title: JS55CT/GeoWKTer: GeoWKTer is a lightweight JS library for converting Well-Known Text (WKT) to GeoJSON. It handles Point, MultiPoint, LineString, MultiLineString, Polygon, MultiPolygon, and GeometryCollection. Ideal for small frontend projects, it efficiently parses and converts spatial data with minimal dependencies.

items.content_html: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).isValid(). Simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!
items.title: nodebysam/tinyvalidation: Tiny Validation is a lightweight, chainable input validation library for Node.js. Validate strings, numbers, emails, and more with ease. Example: validate(input).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).use(TinyValidation.rules.isNotEmpty).isValid(). Simple API, and perfect for quick validation needs without the bloat. Stay minimal, stay efficient!
